item.title: 美国航空公司质疑拜登轮椅乘客保护规定
item.description: 美国主要航空公司和一个行业协会对拜登政府 12 月颁布的一项规定提出质疑，该规定要求为使用轮椅的残疾乘客提供新的消费者保护。【原文：Major U.S. airlines and a trade association have challenged a Biden administration rule issued in December requiring new consumer protections for disabled passengers using wheelchairs.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，亿万富翁投资人 Ryan Cohen 将所持阿里巴巴股份增至 10 亿美元
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周四报道，亿万富翁投资者瑞安-科恩（Ryan Cohen）最近几个月在中国电子商务巨头阿里巴巴集团的个人持股增至约10亿美元，约合700万股。【原文：Billionaire investor Ryan Cohen has in recent months grown his personal stake in Chinese e-commerce giant Alibaba Group to roughly $1 billion, or about 7 million shares, the Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 花旗集团加入企业退出多元化倡议的行列
item.description: 花旗集团首席执行官周四在一份备忘录中表示，花旗集团将不再要求求职面试的候选人具有多样性，因为美国企业正在应对唐纳德-特朗普总统领导下的新商业环境。【原文：Citigroup will no longer require a diverse slate of candidates for job interviews, its CEO said in a memo on Thursday, as corporate America contends with a new business climate under President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 联合信贷银行提前对 Banco BPM 的竞购进行投票，增加可发行股票数量
item.description: 联合信贷银行周四表示，董事会已将原定于 4 月 10 日举行的股东投票提前至 3 月 27 日，以批准发行新股为收购 Banco BPM 提供资金。【原文：UniCredit said on Thursday its board has moved up to March 27 a shareholder vote previously scheduled for April 10 to approve issuing new shares to finance a takeover bid for Banco BPM .】

item.title: 英特尔反犹太主义诉讼被驳回
item.description: 英特尔公司一名犹太裔前雇员指控该芯片制造商在他投诉一名公开反犹太主义的主管后将其解雇，该诉讼已被驳回。【原文：A lawsuit in which a Jewish former employee of Intel accused the chipmaker of firing him after he complained about an openly antisemitic supervisor has been dismissed.】

item.title: 空中客车将在数周内与 Spirit Aero 签订协议：首席财务官
item.description: 空中客车公司首席财务官周四表示，作为航空结构制造商跨大西洋分拆的一部分，该公司预计将在未来几周内敲定收购 Spirit AeroSystems 公司部分欧洲业务的协议。【原文：Airbus expects to firm up a deal to take over some of Spirit AeroSystems European operations in the next few weeks, the planemaker's CFO said on Thursday, as part of a transatlantic breakup of the aerostructures manufacturer.】

item.title: 百事公司与美国大公司一起调整可持续发展政策
item.description: 随着唐纳德-特朗普总统（Donald Trump）推动在联邦政府和私营部门废除多元化、公平和包容计划，越来越多的美国大公司正在对其多元化、公平和包容计划进行改革，百事公司也加入了这一行列。【原文：PepsiCo has joined the growing list of major U.S. companies that are making changes to their diversity, equity and inclusion programs as President Donald Trump pushes to dismantle the practice across the federal government and private sector.】

item.title: 美联储主席巴尔卸任监管职务，警告不要削弱银行规则
item.description: 美联储最高监管官员周四警告说，不要削弱银行规则和监督，否则可能会使企业容易受到意外冲击。【原文：The Federal Reserve's top regulatory official cautioned Thursday against a weakening of bank rules and oversight that could make firms vulnerable to surprise shocks.】

item.title: 美国监管机构撤回对国债市场规则的上诉
item.description: 据周三提交的一份法庭文件显示，美国证券交易委员会已决定撤回其对联邦法官去年底做出的一项决定的上诉，该决定撤销了对财资交易商规则的全面修订。【原文：U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission has decided to withdraw its appeal of a decision by a federal judge late last year to vacate an overhaul of Treasury dealer rules, according to a court document filed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 巴西最高法院命令 X 公司支付 140 万美元
item.description: 巴西最高法院法官亚历山大-德-莫赖斯（Alexandre de Moraes）周四发布的一份法院判决书称，社交媒体平台 X 因不遵守司法命令而被勒令支付 810 万雷亚尔（约合 142 万美元）的罚款。【原文：Brazilian Supreme Court justice Alexandre de Moraes ordered social media platform X to pay a fine of 8.1 million reais ($1.42 million) for noncompliance with judicial orders, according to a court decision issued on Thursday.】

item.title: 投资者向 "关税狂人 "特朗普虚张声势，市场对贸易的不安情绪逐渐消退
item.description: 几周前，唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在关税问题上的每一句话都引发了市场的剧烈波动，但随着投资者将注意力转移到其他方面，并押注全面贸易战不会真正发生，这种波动已逐渐减弱。【原文：The outsized swings in markets on the back of Donald Trump's every word on tariffs just weeks ago have faded to mere flickers, as investors switch their focus elsewhere, and bet against a full-scale trade war really materialising.】

item.title: 白宫：泽连斯基需要回到关键矿产交易的谈判桌前
item.description: 白宫国家安全顾问迈克-华尔兹（Mike Waltz）周四表示，乌克兰总统沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基（Volodymyr Zelenskiy）需要回到谈判桌前，达成一项重要的矿产协议，承认美国在乌克兰抗击俄罗斯的斗争中向该国提供的援助数量。【原文：Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy needs to come back to the negotiating table and strike a critical minerals deal that recognizes the amount of aid the U.S. has provided the country in its fight against Russia, White House national security adviser Mike Waltz said on Thursday.】

item.title: 波音任命杰夫-肖基（Jeff Shockey）为政府运营执行副总裁
item.description: 波音公司周四表示，已任命杰夫-肖基（Jeff Shockey）为政府运营、全球公共政策和企业战略执行副总裁，自 2 月 24 日起生效。【原文：Boeing said on Thursday it has appointed Jeff Shockey as executive vice president of government operations, global public policy and corporate strategy, effective February 24.】

item.title: 美国消费者监督机构的标志在华盛顿总部落下
item.description: 根据一名记者的观察和照片证据，美国消费者金融保护局华盛顿总部的标志牌在一夜之间掉了下来。【原文：Signage marking the Washington headquarters of the U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau, the consumer watchdog in the Trump administration's crosshairs, came down overnight, according to a reporter's observations and photographic evidence.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，收购公司争相收购折扣零售商 Family Dollar
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，私募股权公司阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management）和 Sycamore Partners 是竞标者之一，他们正在竞争收购 Dollar Tree 旗下的折扣零售品牌 Family Dollar。【原文：Private equity firms Apollo Global Management and Sycamore Partners are among the bidders who are competing to acquire Family Dollar, a discount retail brand operated by Dollar Tree , according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 波音问题后，莱昂纳多为航空结构部门找到新合作伙伴
item.description: 意大利莱昂纳多公司（Leonardo）已为其航空结构部门找到了新的工业合作伙伴，该公司因美国飞机制造商波音公司（Boeing）的问题而受到冲击，这家国有控股集团的首席执行官周四表示。【原文：Italy's Leonardo has identified a new industrial partner for its aerostructures unit which has been hit by the problems of U.S. planemaker Boeing , the state-controlled group's CEO said on Thursday.】

item.title: 鸡蛋价格上涨推动通货膨胀，沃尔玛杂货收入增加
item.description: 全球最大的零售商沃尔玛在周四的财报发布会上表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在去年秋季竞选期间经常提到的鸡蛋价格上涨，促进了沃尔玛食品杂货的收入。【原文：Higher egg prices, an issue U.S. President Donald Trump spoke about often during his election campaign last fall, boosted Walmart grocery revenue, the world's largest retailer said during its earnings briefing on Thursday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，普拉达可在四周内独家获取范思哲的财务数据
item.description: 一位与此事关系密切的消息人士周四透露，意大利奢侈品集团普拉达（Prada）已先于其他潜在收购者，获得了规模较小的竞争对手范思哲（Versace）的财务数据，而范思哲的所有者卡普里控股公司（Capri Holdings）已将范思哲出售。【原文：Italian luxury group Prada has been given access, ahead of any other potential suitors, to the financial data of smaller rival Versace which owner Capri Holdings has put up for sale, a source close to the matter said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国就是否撤销 40 亿美元加州高铁拨款展开调查
item.description: 特朗普政府周四表示，将开始审查是否撤销向加州高铁项目提供的约 40 亿美元资金。【原文：The Trump administration said Thursday it is opening a review into whether to rescind about $4 billion awarded to California's High-Speed Rail project.】

item.title: 礼来公司豪赌减肥药，库存达 5.5 亿美元
item.description: 礼来公司（Eli Lilly）周三提交的一份文件显示，该公司在报告其晚期试验数据之前，就已经在其财务报表中记录了近 5.5 亿美元的 "上市前库存"，从而在其实验性口服减肥药上押下了重注。【原文：Eli Lilly is betting big on its experimental oral weight-loss drug even before reporting data from its late-stage trial by recording nearly $550 million in "pre-launch inventory" in its financial statements, a filing showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 哨兵中游公司关注美国石油出口项目的最终投资决策
item.description: 石油运输和储存公司 Sentinel Midstream 首席执行官杰夫-巴拉德（Jeff Ballard）告诉路透社，一旦获得美国政府的许可，该公司预计将就其在得克萨斯州海岸的深水石油出口项目做出最终投资决定。【原文：Oil transportation and storage company Sentinel Midstream expects to make a final investment decision on its deepwater oil export project off the Texas coast as soon as it receives a U.S. government license, CEO Jeff Ballard told Reuters.】

item.title: 美联储主席古尔斯比称 PCE 通胀读数不太可能像 CPI 那样 "令人警醒
item.description: 芝加哥联储主席奥斯坦-古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）周四表示，他预计美国央行用于设定通胀目标的通胀读数不会像此前公布的消费者物价指数那样 "令人清醒"。【原文：Chicago Federal Reserve President Austan Goolsbee on Thursday said he does not expect the inflation reading the U.S. central bank uses to set its inflation target to be as "sobering" as the previously reported Consumer Price Index figures.】

item.title: 美联储穆萨莱姆警告通胀预期升温和滞胀风险
item.description: 圣路易斯联储主席阿尔贝托-穆萨莱姆强调了美国中央银行可能面临的困难选择。【原文：St. Louis Fed President Alberto Musalem highlighted potentially difficult choices facing the U.S. central bank.】

item.title: 雷普索尔公司将绿色氢气目标削减多达 63
item.description: 西班牙能源公司雷普索尔（Repsol）首席执行官约苏-乔恩-伊马兹（Josu Jon Imaz）周四表示，该公司将其 2030 年绿色制氢目标削减了多达 63%，这凸显了严重依赖补贴的高成本行业所面临的挑战。【原文：Spanish energy company Repsol cut its 2030 target for green hydrogen production by up to 63%, Chief Executive Josu Jon Imaz said on Thursday, highlighting the challenges of a high-cost industry heavily reliant on subsidies.】

item.title: 首席执行官：特朗普关税可能促使空客优先考虑非美国客户
item.description: 空中客车公司首席执行官纪尧姆-福瑞（Guillaume Faury）周四在接受CNBC采访时表示，如果美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收的关税扰乱了该公司在美国的进口，那么空中客车公司可能会优先向非美国客户交付产品。【原文：Airbus could prioritise deliveries to non-U.S. customers if tariffs imposed by U.S. President Donald Trump were to disrupt the company's imports in the country, CEO Guillaume Faury said in an interview with CNBC on Thursday.】

item.title: 特朗普提名的人选表示，该机构将采取公平、客观的方法来处理特斯拉安全问题
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统提名的美国交通部第二高官誓言，政府将采取公正客观的方式监督特斯拉汽车安全调查。【原文：President Donald Trump's nominee to serve as the second highest ranking official at the U.S. Transportation Department vowed the government will take a fair and objective approach to overseeing auto safety probes into Tesla .】

item.title: Together AI 最新融资后估值达 33 亿美元
item.description: Together AI 周四表示，在完成 3.05 亿美元的融资后，公司估值达到了 33 亿美元。【原文：Together AI said on Thursday it hit a valuation of $3.3 billion after a $305 million funding round.】

item.title: 特朗普提名的候选人称，美国监管机构 "需要对波音公司更加严厉"。
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统提名的美国交通部副部长说，监管机构需要采取更积极的方法来监督飞机制造商波音公司。【原文：President Donald Trump's nominee to serve as deputy secretary of the U.S. Transportation Department said regulators need to take a more aggressive approach to overseeing planemaker Boeing .】

item.title: 美联储博斯蒂克预计 2025 年降息两次，但认为不确定性普遍存在
item.description: 亚特兰大联储主席拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）周四表示，尽管美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易和移民政策的影响仍存在广泛的不确定性，但美国央行今年仍应能够将利率下调半个百分点。【原文：Atlanta Federal Reserve President Raphael Bostic said on Thursday the U.S. central bank should still be able to lower interest rates by a half a percentage point this year, though there remains extensive uncertainty about the impact of President Donald Trump's trade and immigration policies.】

item.title: 塔吉特公司被佛罗里达州起诉在 DEI 问题上欺骗股东
item.description: Target 周四被佛罗里达州起诉，指控其隐瞒多元化和社会活动的风险，导致顾客反弹，股价下跌。【原文：Target was sued on Thursday by the state of Florida for allegedly concealing the risks of its diversity and social initiatives, leading to a backlash among customers that caused its stock price to decline.】
